Package com.complexible.common.io

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataInputProcessor<T,I extends DataInput>
    An interface for an object which can take input from DataInput and create an object out of the contents of the input, similar to the ByteProcessor in Guava.
    DataOutputFunnel<T,O extends DataOutput>
    Similar to the Guava Funnel, implementations of this class are expected to take the input provided to the funnel method and write it to the DataOutput object.
    FileRotationStrategy
    Interface for implementing file rotation policies.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteStreams2
    Utility class to hold functionality not already contained in ByteStreams
    DataInputProcessors
    Utility class which contains readers for the standard primitives & serializable types.
    DataInputToInputStreamAdapter
    Adapter to treat a DataInput as an InputStream.
    DataOutputFunnels
    Utility class which contains output funnels for common primitive types and serializables.
    EncryptedFile
    A extended File which will return an input or output stream for reading and writing to the file in an encrypted/decrypted manner.
    Files2
    Collection of utility functions for file-centric operations.
    ForwardingDataInput
    Base class for creating a DataInput decorator
    ForwardingDataOutput
    Base class for creating DataOutput decorators.
    InputStreamDataInput
    A DataInput as an InputStream, akin to DataInputStream in that both classes are a DataInput and an InputStream, so rather than declaring a parameter is type DataInputStream you can revert to using <T extends InputStream & DataInput> and be able to use either class.
    MMapUtil
    Utility class which provides a method for attempting to directly unmap a MappedByteBuffer rather than waiting for the JVM & OS eventually unmap.
    OutputStreamDataOutput
    A DataOutput as an OutputStream, akin to DataOutputStream in that both classes are a DataOutput and an OutputStream, so rather than declaring a parameter is type DataOutputStream you can revert to using <T extends OutputStream & DataOutput> and be able to use either class.
    PeekingDataInputStream
    A DataInputStream that supports peeking at the next byte in the stream.
    PeekingInputStream
    An InputStream that supports peeking at the next byte in the stream
    SizeRotationStrategy
    A rotation strategy which will rotate a file once it grows past a certain size threshold (in bytes).
    TimeRotationStrategy
    Basic rotation strategy for specifying a rotation policy based on time intervals.
    UncloseableOutputStream
    A wrapper around the underlying stream that prevents the underlying stream from being closed (if passed to other methods that are not very nice and close your stream).
    WritableByteChannelDataOutputAdapter
    An adapter for a DataOutput to use it as a WritableByteChannel.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataInputProcessors.Primitives  
    DataOutputFunnels.Primitives
